about_text: a passionate Software Engineer specialized in building modern, secure, and user-centric web applications.
about_text2: I blend frontend development with cybersecurity awareness and data analysis to deliver efficient, scalable digital solutions.
about_text3: Whether it’s crafting clean interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS, or integrating backend logic with Node.js — I’m all about bringing ideas to life securely and beautifully.
